attributes.action: Help keep the fertility clinic at Spire Gatwick Park hospital open.
attributes.background: The fertility treatment at The Spire Gatwick Park Hospital is outstanding. The level of care is second to none and it's the only private fertility facility in the West Sussex area, if it closes down there will be no fertility treatment locally for people suffering from causes of infertility.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Private healthcare is the responsibility of providers, not the UK Government and Parliament.
